summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Office of Election Administration; increasing certain expenditure allowances in the 1985 Budget of the Office to establish accounts to pay the costs and expenses of the preparation and publication of election pamphlets for the 1985 primary and general elections and to implement the designation system to finance the City's Campaign Matching Fund Account, by reduction, reappropriation and transfer of amounts authorized for these purposes in the 1985 Budget of the Department of Finance General.
